workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Manage storage structures for Oracle Database 21c

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup compute instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: View the storage structures in Oracle Database
tutorials.description: How to view control files and archive logs in your database from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC).

tutorials.title: Lab 5: View and multiplex online redo log file information
tutorials.description: How to to view and multiplex online redo log file information from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC)

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Manage tablespaces
tutorials.description: How to view the tablespaces in your Oracle Database and create a new tablespace from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC).

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Manage undo data
tutorials.description: How to view and manage the undo data from Oracle Enterprise Manager Cloud Control (Oracle EMCC).

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
